languages.text: "Инструменты, закаляющие плоть. Если пренебрегать практиками самоистязания, тело слабеет, и чувствительность может вернуться. А с ней лавиной накроет боль всех пережитых ран... И ты сойдешь с ума быстрее, чем Неумирающий прошепчет твое имя".

"Tools for tempering the flesh. If a spinner neglects this practice for too long, their body will weaken and their sensitivity to pain might return. If it does, they will feel the overwhelming agony of every wound they have ever endured... and go mad with torment before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."
languages.original_text: "Инструменты, закаляющие плоть. Если пренебрегать практиками самоистязания, тело слабеет, и чувствительность может вернуться. А с ней лавиной накроет боль всех пережитых ран... И ты сойдешь с ума быстрее, чем Неумирающий прошепчет твое имя".

traits.locale_text: "Tools for tempering the flesh. If a weaver neglects the self-infliction techniques for too long, their body weakens and their sensitivity might return. And with it, a torrent of pain from every wound they have ever received... They will go mad before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."

"Tools for tempering the flesh. If a weaver neglects the self-infliction techniques for too long, their body weakens and their sensitivity might return. And with it, a torrent of pain from every wound they have ever received... They will go mad before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."

"Tools for tempering the flesh. If a weaver neglects this practice for too long, their body will weaken and their sensitivity to pain might return. If it does, they will feel the overwhelming agony of every wound they have ever endured... and go mad with torment before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."

If it does, they will feel the overwhelming agony of every wound they have ever endured... and go mad with torment before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."

If it does, they will feel the overwhelming agony of every wound they have ever endured... and go mad with torment before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."

"Tools for tempering the flesh. If a spinner neglects this practice for too long, their body will weaken and their sensitivity to pain might return. If it does, they will feel the overwhelming agony of every wound they have ever endured... and go mad with torment before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."

languages.text: «Herramientas para atemperar la carne. Si un tejedor descuida esta práctica durante demasiado tiempo, su cuerpo se debilita y podría acabar recuperando la sensibilidad al dolor. Si ocurriese tal cosa, notaría la abrumadora agonía de todas las heridas que hubiera sufrido previamente... y el tormento le haría enloquecer antes de que el Emperador Inmortal susurrase su nombre».
languages.original_text: "Tools for tempering the flesh. If a spinner neglects this practice for too long, their body will weaken and their sensitivity to pain might return. If it does, they will feel the overwhelming agony of every wound they have ever endured... and go mad with torment before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."

Si ocurriese tal cosa, notaría la abrumadora agonía de todas las heridas que hubiera sufrido previamente... y el tormento le haría enloquecer antes de que el Emperador Inmortal susurrase su nombre».

«Herramientas para atemperar la carne. Si un tejedor descuida esta práctica durante demasiado tiempo, su cuerpo se debilita y podría acabar recuperando la sensibilidad al dolor. Si ocurriese tal cosa, notaría la abrumadora agonía de todas las heridas que hubiera sufrido previamente... y el tormento le haría enloquecer antes de que el Emperador Inmortal susurrase su nombre».

languages.text: 「肉体を鍛えるための道具よ。もし織り手が長期間この訓練を怠れば、体が弱って、痛みに対する感受性が戻ってしまうかもしれない。もしそうなれば、彼らはこれまで耐えてきたあらゆる傷の圧倒的な苦痛を感じて…不死の皇帝がその名前を囁くより前に、苦痛で気がおかしくなってしまうでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Tools for tempering the flesh. If a spinner neglects this practice for too long, their body will weaken and their sensitivity to pain might return. If it does, they will feel the overwhelming agony of every wound they have ever endured... and go mad with torment before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."

traits.locale_text: 「肉体を鍛えるための道具よ。もし織り手が長期間この訓練を怠れば、体が弱って、痛みに対する感受性が戻ってしまうかもしれない。もしそうなれば、彼らはこれまで耐えてきたあらゆる傷の圧倒的な苦痛を感じて…不死の皇帝がその名前を囁くより前に、苦痛で気がおかしくなってしまうでしょう」
「肉体を鍛えるための道具よ。もしウィーヴァーが長期間この訓練を怠れば、体が弱って、痛みに対する感受性が戻ってしまうかもしれない。もしそうなれば、彼らはこれまで耐えてきたあらゆる傷の圧倒的な苦痛を感じて…不死の皇帝がその名前を囁くより前に、苦痛で気がおかしくなってしまうでしょう」

languages.text: “这些都是用来磨砺肉体的工具。如果织网者长时间不做这样的练习，他们的身体就会变得孱弱，对疼痛的感受也可能会再度复苏。在这种情况下，他们身上的伤口会给他们带来可怕的疼痛……在不死神皇轻声呼唤他们的名字之前，他们恐怕就会被痛苦逼疯。”
languages.original_text: "Tools for tempering the flesh. If a spinner neglects this practice for too long, their body will weaken and their sensitivity to pain might return. If it does, they will feel the overwhelming agony of every wound they have ever endured... and go mad with torment before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."

traits.locale_text: “这些都是用来磨砺肉体的工具。如果织网者长时间不做这样的练习，他们的身体就会变得孱弱，对疼痛的感受也可能会再度复苏。在这种情况下，他们身上的伤口会给他们带来可怕的疼痛……在不死神皇轻声呼唤他们的名字之前，他们恐怕就会被痛苦逼疯。”
“这些都是用来磨砺肉体的工具。如果织网者长时间不做这样的练习，他们的身体就会变得孱弱，对疼痛的敏感也可能会恢复。在这种情况下，他们身上的伤口会给他们带来巨大的痛苦……恐怕在不死神皇轻声呼唤他们的名字之前，他们就会被痛楚折磨得发疯。”

languages.text: "Werkzeuge zur Abhärtung des Fleisches. Wenn ein Spinner diese Übung zu lange vernachlässigt, wird sein Körper geschwächt, und die Schmerzempfindlichkeit kann zurückkehren. In dem Fall spürt er die überwältigende Agonie jeder Wunde, die ihm jemals beigebracht wurde ... und wird wahnsinnig vor Qual, bis der Todlose seinen Namen flüstert."
languages.original_text: "Tools for tempering the flesh. If a spinner neglects this practice for too long, their body will weaken and their sensitivity to pain might return. If it does, they will feel the overwhelming agony of every wound they have ever endured... and go mad with torment before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."

In dem Fall spürt er die überwältigende Agonie jeder Wunde, die ihm jemals beigebracht wurde ... und wird wahnsinnig vor Qual, bis der Todlose seinen Namen flüstert."

"Werkzeuge zur Abhärtung des Fleisches. Wenn ein Weber diese Übung zu lange vernachlässigt, wird sein Körper geschwächt, und die Schmerzempfindlichkeit kann zurückkehren. In dem Fall spürt er die überwältigende Agonie jeder Wunde, die ihm jemals beigebracht wurde ... und wird wahnsinnig vor Qual, bis der Todlose seinen Namen flüstert."

languages.text: « Des instruments conçus pour fortifier la chair. Si un tisseur néglige trop longtemps son entraînement, son corps finit par s'affaiblir et sa sensibilité à la douleur par revenir. Le cas échéant, il ressent l'agonie accablante de chacune des plaies reçues par le passé... et son tourment a toutes les chances de le rendre fou avant que l'Empereur Immortel murmure son nom. »
languages.original_text: "Tools for tempering the flesh. If a spinner neglects this practice for too long, their body will weaken and their sensitivity to pain might return. If it does, they will feel the overwhelming agony of every wound they have ever endured... and go mad with torment before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."

languages.text: "Bedenin eğitimi için araçlar. Uzun süre bunu ihmal eden dokurların bedeni zayıflar ve yeniden acıya duyarlı hâle gelebilirler. Bu yaşanırsa da ömürlerinde aldıkları tüm yaraların dayanılmaz ızdırabını hissederler... Sonra da Ölmeyen İmparator daha isimlerini fısıldayamadan eziyetten delirirler."
languages.original_text: "Tools for tempering the flesh. If a spinner neglects this practice for too long, their body will weaken and their sensitivity to pain might return. If it does, they will feel the overwhelming agony of every wound they have ever endured... and go mad with torment before the Undying Emperor whispers their name."
